author: adrianc
msg: 1. Work effort tasks are now converted to VTODO.
2. Event reminders can be a popup alarm
Tested with Mozilla Sunbird. Sunbird has some annoying bugs when using read-only calendars - which they are aware of but haven't fixed. Someday I'll make the iCalendar read/write.
This commit includes a migration service for anyone who was using this feature previously.

author: mikemccand
msg: fix tests to pass on Java 1.4, again

author: gbrown
msg: Add support for inline scripts to WTKXSerializer; allow event handlers to be specified using a simplified function-based syntax.

author: gertv
msg: SMXCOMP-567: ConcurrentModificationException when running servicemix-camel routes under high load
